topic.title: influenza Treatment Not Given Substance Administration - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL conform to PHCR Treatment Not Given Substance Administration template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.56)

6. SHALL contain [1..1] consumable , which a. SHALL contain [1..1] manufacturedProduct , which i. SHALL contain [1..1] manufacturedMaterial ), which 1. SHALL contain [1..1] code/@code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.3244 PHVS_MedicationTreatment_Flu DYNAMIC ), which a. SHOULD contain [0..1] originalText
SHALL conform to PHCR Treatment Not Given Substance Administration template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.56)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1932)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1934)
Contains exactly one [1..1] consumable, where its type is Consumable

6. SHALL contain [1..1] consumable , which a. SHALL contain [1..1] manufacturedProduct , which i. SHALL contain [1..1] manufacturedMaterial ), which 1. SHALL contain [1..1] code/@code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.3244 PHVS_MedicationTreatment_Flu DYNAMIC ), which a. SHOULD contain [0..1] originalText

p.ph: influenza Treatment Not Given Substance Administration
